def traverse_signal_tree(tree: VSSNode, fd: TextIOWrapper, static_uid: bool, add_optional: bool):
    fd.write('syntax = "proto3";\n\n')

    imports = []
    for node in findall(tree, filter_=lambda n: isinstance(n.data, VSSDataDatatype)):
        datatype = node.data.datatype
        if "." not in datatype:
            continue
        struct_path = Path(node.data.datatype.replace(".", "/"))  # type: ignore
        imports.append(f"{struct_path.parent}/{struct_path.parent.name}.proto")
    write_imports(fd, imports)

    # write proto messages to file
    for node in findall(tree, filter_=lambda node: isinstance(node.data, VSSDataBranch)):
        fd.write(f"message {node.get_fqn('')} {{" + "\n")
        print_messages(node.children, fd, static_uid, add_optional)
        fd.write("}\n\n")

def is_VSS_leaf(node: VSSNode) -> bool:
    return isinstance(node.data, VSSDataDatatype)

def is_VSS_branch(node: VSSNode) -> bool:
    return node.data == VSSDataBranch and not node.is_instance

def is_VSS_branch_instance(node: VSSNode) -> bool:
    return node.data == "VSSDataBranch" and node.is_instance == True

def fnv1_32_hash(identifier: bytes) -> int:
    hval = 0xcbf29ce484222325
    fnv_prime = 0x100000001b3
    for byte in identifier:
        hval ^= byte
        hval *= fnv_prime
    return hval
